thread.title: Neymar's new look has Barcelona stars in stitches | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Neymar's new look has Barcelona stars in stitches | Daily Mail Online

author: Tom Bassam For Mailonline
title: Neymar's new look has Barcelona stars in stitches | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share In a video from the session, Luis Suarez, Gerard Pique and Lionel Messi can all be seen making fun of the Brazilian, although it is not immediately obvious why. Suarez makes it clear with a hand gesture over his top lip. After the derision from his team-mates whether or not Neymar's moustache experiment makes it to kick-off on Tuesday night remains to be seen. In footballing matters, Neymar missed the win over Atletico Madrid in the Champions League a week ago and scored versus Alaves on Saturday in La Liga so should be ready for the challenge of facing PSG in Paris. Whether Neymar will opt for a shave before Barcelona take on PSG remains to be seen Barcelona boast an impressive record of three wins in their past three meetings with the French Champions and the main reason for that success has been Neymar. The 25-year-old has scored in each of those victories, while he also netted in the previous match, a 3-2 PSG win. His tally against the Ligue 1 side is five goals from four matches, in comparison Messi and Suarez have netted three goals apiece against Les Parisiens. RELATED ARTICLES
